ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISNEW() && loan__Manual_Payment__c && ( ROUND(loan__Transaction_Amount__c,2) != ( ROUND(loan__Fees__c,2) + ROUND(loan__Interest__c,2) + ROUND(loan__Principal__c,2) + ROUND(loan__Excess__c,2)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Interest, Principal, Fees and Excess must sum up to Transaction amount.
